sentences: During an informal session in the evening, delegates were presented with a draft matrix of a work programme for 2008, with the focus and specific activities for each upcoming session to be elaborated.
Discussions centered on a possible workshop on the shared vision, including the timing and whether it should be party-driven.
Delegates also considered holding a ministerial discussion on the issue at COP 14.
The group also noted the need to discuss interlinkages between building blocks, and the timing for elaborating a work programme for 2009.
enb_long_title: First session of the Ad Hoc Working Group on Long-term Cooperative Action under the Convention (AWGLCA 1) and Fifth session of the Ad Hoc Working Group on Further Commitments for Annex I Parties under the Kyoto Protocol to the UNFCCC (AWG 5)
